item.title: Villagers demand restoration of bus service
item.description: <![CDATA[Gadwal: Residents of Pedda Tandrapadu village in Rajoli Mandal submitted a petition to RTC Traffic Inspector Srinivas Shetty at the Gadwal RTC Depot on Monday, urging the reintroduction of bus service from Shantinagar to Pedda Tandrapadu. The villagers expressed their grievances, stating that prior to the COVID-19 lockdown, a regular bus ser-vice operated along this route. However, even after the lockdown was lifted, the service was discontin-ued, causing significant hardships for residents of P...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
